  * "No Country For Old Men" (2007) - This crime thriller stars John Goodman, Matthew McConaughey, and William H Macy. The movie follows two former Texas Rangers (Goodman & McConaughey) as they track down one of their greatest enemies (H Macy)).
  * "The Godfather" (1972) - This classic crime drama stars Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, and Robert Duvall. The movie follows the story of the Corleone family, who are powerful organized crime family in New York City.
  * "Goodfellas" (1992) - This dark comedy-drama film stars Ray Liotta, Tommy Wiseau, Joe Pesci, and Michael Madsen. The movie tells the story of a group of Italian-American mobsters from the New York City area who rise to power in organized crime.
  * "The Godfather Part II" (1974) - This sequel film stars Al Pacino, James Caan, and Richard S. Per龄. The movie tells the story of Don Corleone's youngest son, Michael Corleone, who returns home from World War II to take over the Corleone family business.
